item.description: The Boston Green Business Networking Group realizes that not only do like minded businesses naturally tend help promote each other but we also have the potential to help the entire industry grow and spread here in the US and abroad. Boston historically has been the hub of innovation, growth and networking. Boston is, and always has been, a leader in the conventions and industry trade show industries that bring like minded people together for the sharing and growth of new ideas, technologies and businesses. Steeped in this tradition we set our goals. Please join us on this journey to the future!
item.name: The Boston Green Business Networking Group
